entries.desc: Creates a new server socket bound to port.

entries.name: accept => tcpsocketclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Accepts an incoming connection. It returns a new TCPSocket object.

entries.name: accept_nonblock([options]) => tcpsocketclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Accepts an incoming connection using accept(2) after O_NONBLOCK is set for the underlying file descriptor. It returns an accepted TCPSocket for the incoming connection.

entries.name: listen( int ) => 0click to toggle source
entries.desc: Listens for connections, using the specified int as the backlog. A call to listen only applies if the socket is of type SOCK_STREAM or SOCK_SEQPACKET.

entries.name: sysaccept => file_descriptorclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a file descriptor of a accepted connection.
